content: पश्चात् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (Used by itself or with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab>) {@--1@} From behind, from the back; पश्चाद्वद्धपुरुषमादाय <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; पश्चा दुच्चैर्भवति हरिणः स्वांगमायच्छमानः <ls>Ś. 4</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--2@} Behind, backwards, towards the back (<ab>opp.</ab> पुरः); गच्छति पुरः शरीरं धावति पश्चादसंरतुतं चेतः <ls>Ś. 1. 34</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">3. 8.</ls> {@--3@} After (in time or space), then, afterwards, subsequently; लध्वी पुरा वृद्धिमती च पश्चात् <ls>Bh. 2. 60</ls>; तस्य पश्चात् ‘after him’; <ls>R. 4. 30</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 7</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">17</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">39</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 29</ls>; <ls>Me. 36</ls>, <ls n="Me.">44.</ls> {@--4@} At last, lastly, finally. {@--5@} From the west. {@--6@} Towards the west, westward.
